name: Boom Beat
description:
"Welcome to your new job, rookie! Today we're performing a fireworks show from our new state of the art pyrotechnics booth. Your job is just to do what I say to keep the audience happy. Isn't my job great? Unlike our old booths, all of the important stuff is nice and big so even you can't miss them!  We're going to keep on going until either you mess up, or we run out of fireworks, and keep in mind, we have a lot of fireworks! If you do good enough, you might even get on our office leaderboard, though remember, I hold the high score!"

Boom Beat is a VR Rhythm-based game where you must activate a variety of mechanisms as instructed to create a fireworks display. 

  • Super simple gameplay that anyone can pick up regardless of VR experience!
  • Create an amazing fireworks display!
  • Challenge your friends to beat your high score!
  • Great for parties and local multiplayer!

Out now!

Website: www.stealthstrike.co.uk

Twitter: @stealth_strike

Facebook: www.facebook.com/StealthStrike/

Support for the Rift exists but is untested, any feedback on how it performs would be greatly appreciated!
